ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Adopted village under beti bachao beti padhao abhiyan in Patiala, more than 50 play organised under female foeticide in villages. working for women empowerment livelihood and rural development.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We could not get any grant from any department in the year 2015-16. we organizes our NGO activities through our local donors under Beti Bachao Beti Padhao. we organize 50 theater play at various villages in Patiala Punjab to aware public for female foeticide. we organize many other activities like generation of livelihood for BPL,SC

In year 2016-17 we got Rs.100000 (Rs.One Lakh only) from Rural development and Panchyati Raj Department for livelihood program project in Patiala. at the same time we also worked for our other theme in which stop child labor, awareness program through Theater groups in villages for drug de adiction and female foeticide. Worked for POCSO act etc.

In the year 2017-18 we do not received any fund from any Govt. (State or Central). We run our Foundation through individual sponsorship. in the year 2017-18 we focused on Livelihood generation for BPL/OBC/SC and minorities also. we also worked for child rights and women empowerment. we worked for female foeticide, prevent youth from drugs. Swach Bharat Abhiyan in rural areas.

In the year 2018-19 we got Rs. 100000 (Rs.One Lakh Only) through Punjab State Social Security Department for Beauty and Wellness Course. in which we gave training to 30 girls from rural background in which BPL/SC/OBC and minority girls got benefited. apart from this we organize other activities also in which we worked for cleanliness mission, social awareness program, theater play for POCSO Act. Domestic violence, Beti Bachao, Beti Padaho. Women empowerment etc.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: â€œAshirwadâ€ (The North India Cerebral Palsy Association) is a rehabilitation center cum school for cerebral palsy affected children. It is the only institution of its kind, catering to the need to Spastic Children in whole of north India, beyond Delhi. The center is having over 500 children registered with it, who are being looked after by specialized staff such as Occupational Therapist, Speech Therapist, Physiotherapist, and Special Educator Etc. To provide all these services under one roof.Children of Ashirwad are getting these services regularly. Provision of orthotic aids and appliance. Parent training and home based program for children from out-station Awareness arising workshop for parentsâ€™ teachers and doctors. Goal To achieve full inclusion of person with Disabilities into Main Steam Objectives 1) To work for the rehabilitation â€“ physical, education, vocational, ADL training to children with disabilities and multiple disabilities. a) To provide intensive early intervention services â€“ to minimize the erect of disabilities and to prevent secondary disabilities. b) To provide a special education services â€“ to children who cannot cope up with normal education system. c) To provide pre-vocational and vocational guidance and training to prepare young adults with disabilities to adopt some vocation. 2) For the betterment of Society â€“ a) To make accessibility a possibility â€“ removal of all physical barriers. b) Promoting inclusive education in normal school. c) Making parents and families aware about concessions and benefits available for their child with disabilities. d) To help and support parents and families to overcome stress of rearing a child with disabilities. e) To spread rehabilitation services for children with disabilities in rural areas and slums. f) Advocacy g) Breaking Barriers District Level Republic Day function was celebrated at Govt. College for Boys. the NGO working for disability sector- Ashirwad, took part in the cultural programme to showcase the abilities of person with disabilities. Ashirwad has provided this opportunity first time to children with disabilities to participate in the official District Level Republic Day function.
